channel.title: Comments on: SNIPPET: Them Crooked Vultures “Nobody Loves Me and Neither Do I”

item.title: By: Trey
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description: they played a show Monday night at the Metro in Chicago but only snippets have made it out - they were apparently amazingly strict with no recording. The reviews seem to be pretty positive though.
item.content:encoded: they played a show Monday night at the Metro in Chicago but only snippets have made it out – they were apparently amazingly strict with no recording. The reviews seem to be pretty positive though.
